chapter.title: Overview
chapter.para: This chapter provides a guided tour of Nix.

sect1.title: Basic package management
sect1.para: Let's start from the perspective of an end-user. Common operations at this level are to install and remove packages, ask what packages are installed or available for installation, and so on.
To install packages, a Nix expression is required that tells Nix how to build that package. There is a standard distribution of Nix expressions for many common packages.
